sentences.sContent: Drivers are advised to seek alternative routes.
sentences.sCn: 驾车者被告知需另寻其他路线。

sentences.sContent: They quickly sought to distance themselves from the protesters.
sentences.sCn: 他们迅速设法远离抗议者。

sentences.sContent: ...Some of us will seek it out; for others it will feel like an unwelcome intrusion into otherwise stable careers...
...we seek only the information we want...
...It's not easy for most people to actively seek conflict...
...It is human nature to seek joy in life...
...they don't seek as many management roles...
...The woman should seek help from tutoring services...
...advertisers will seek to reach this market As consumers get more of their news and information from the Internet...
